titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2299) making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2002, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-309, by Mr. Reynolds.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2299 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 103.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 299.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/30/2001--Passed House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2299 (FY 2002 Department of Transportation and related agencies appropriations).
